name: ConVEX
body:
### ChibiOS/RT on VEX

A collection of drivers for the VEX cortex.  This code links with the ChibiOS/RT RTOS to create standalone robotic applications on the VEX cortex.

### Doxygen documentation
[Doxygen](doxygen/index.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
